page.title: 10BIRDS OF PREY-2
page.content: {Barn owl The barn owl eats small mammals up to the size of a rabbit.In the day he sits under trees or in old barns sleeping but at night he comes out to catch food.He lets out a screech to warn all the animals that he is coming to hunt.There are quite a lot of owls that have different colours of eyes. Yellow eyes are best at night,orange for twilight and brown for day. {Peregrine falcon The peregrine is becoming quite rare. Farmers spray their crops with chemicals and then little birds eat the crops and then the perigrine eats the birds and dies.Also they were shot during the war for killing carrier pigeons with messages. They have lovely blue feathers and a striped breast.People now keep them for hunting game.
